# Available secondary effect types (see: ### spiercepercent: Shield pierce percentage
### spierceflat: Shield pierce amount (applied after shieldpiercepercent)
### tickloss: Makes the target lose initiative. Value is used to calculate the chance to apply the loss (see "epm")
if duration is applicable: duration is the amout of ticks lost on success.

# Available secondary effect types (see: ### degrade: Degrades armor protection on each hit (not glance or deflect)
it is stated explicitly):: hit- and crit-threshold by the given value for the rest of the battle.

# Available secondary effect types (see: ###          Degrade chance is NOT reduced by EPM.
# Available damage types:  HEAT
# Available weapon sizes:  D (Drone)
# "Pref. target sizes": Define which hull size classes the weapon tries to target first
if duration is applicable: in the given order. As long as enemy hulls of the given size remain
it is stated explicitly):: the target is selected from enemy hulls of the given size at random with a chance of "pref. target probability". Otherwise
column4: the target is selected at random.
